title: Why Desegregation Hasn't Fixed America's Civil Rights Problems
text:
Why Desegregation Hasn't Fixed America's Civil Rights Problems 
Published By: Digg.com - Today 
Residential segregation in major US metros continues to decline significantly. But mixed neighborhoods are hardly an endpoint for equality....
